data.message:
Please look at FB. A police officer has a small boy in handcuff and is hurting him. PLEASE check it thank you. It is under Anonymous

The boy is crying and saying YOU are hurting me

replies.message: Hi Sharon. If you ever see something on Facebook that you think goes against our Community Standards, please report it to us: http://bit.ly/2yvfwMF. -Elizabeth
Facebook but it needs to have attention NOw

Hey Sharon. Reporting the content itself is the quickest and most accurate way of bringing something that shouldn't be on Facebook to our attention. We appreciate you taking the time to report it! -Elizabeth
